name: Legplates of the Chromatic Defier

Legplates of the Chromatic DefierLevel 60

To forge the Legplates of the Chromatic Defier, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':

1 Chromatic Carapace.

10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.

10 Blood of Heroes.

5 Skin of Shadow.

Requirements:
- Chromatic Carapace
- Brilliant Chromatic Scale x 10
- Blood of Heroes x 10
- Skin of Shadow x 5
